[theguardian.com](https://www.theguardian.com/football/article/2024/jul/25/early-swanson-double-gives-uswnt-comfortable-win-over-zambia-in-olympic-opener)Group B: USA 3-0 ZambiaEmma Hayes wins first competitive match as US coachMallory Swanson scored a pair of goals just moments apart in the first half and the United States opened their Olympics campaign with a 3-0 victory Thursday night over Zambia, giving new coach Emma Hayes a win in her first major tournament with the team. Trinity Rodman also scored for the US, who are hoping to add a record fifth gold medal to their Olympic collection. Overmatched from the start, Zambia were reduced to 10 p - [What are the best snacks and sleep strategies to stay up late for the Olympics?](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/what-are-the-best-snacks-and-sleep-strategies-to-stay-up-late-for-the-olympics/view/)Australia's best athletes will test their strength, stamina, and endurance at the Olympics. [Antoine Dupont’s dream finish clinches France’s rugby sevens semi-final spot](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/antoine-duponts-dream-finish-clinches-frances-rugby-sevens-semi-final-spot/view/) [via](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/antoine-duponts-dream-finish-clinches-frances-rugby-sevens-semi-final-spot/) [theguardian.com](https://www.theguardian.com/sport/article/2024/jul/25/antoine-duponts-dream-finish-clinches-frances-rugby-sevens-semi-final-spot)Argentina 14 France 26South Africa, Fiji and Australia make up last-four lineupThere haven’t been many rugby sevens matches quite like the quarter-final between France and Argentina, haven’t, in all honesty, been many Olympic moments quite like it either. France won it 26-14, their last, match-winning, try, a spectacular solo tap-and-go scored by (who else but?) Antoine Dupont. But it wasn’t the action that made the occasion, good as it was, but the atmosphere around it. There - [Paula Radcliffe defends child rapist's inclusion in Olympics](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/paula-radcliffe-defends-child-rapists-inclusion-in-olympics/view/)BBC pundit Paula Radcliffe, who later apologised, told British radio station LBC that she wishedNetherlands beach volleyball player Steven van de Velde the "best of luck". - [Aussies end rugby sevens curse by qualifying for medal rounds;
